specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Non-chlorine bleach when needed, for whites only Tumble dry normal low heat Iron on low heat on reverse side if needed Performance Mechanical Stretch Mechanical stretch in textiles refers to the ability of a fabric to stretch and recover without elastomeric / spandex fibers. It is a property that provides comfort, flexibility, and ease of movement to the wearer. Recommended Use Activewear
